Title: Establishes the "EmpowerED Act: Empowering students and enhancing educational opportunities in New York"
Summary: Establishes interregional enrollment of students taking classes in multiple school districts (Part A); allows students who are enrolled in and taking classes in multiple school districts to receive cooperative and individualized educational services (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing interregional enrollment of students in multiple school districts (Part A); and to amend the education law, in relation to the provision of cooperative and individualized educational services for students who are enrolled in multiple school districts (Part B)
